title: Multiclassing
content: that Multiclassing would have the prerequisites it does in 5e - namely, characters would have to reach certain Ability Score numbers for certain Abilities associated with the Class in order to Multiclass into that Class. In Baldur's Gate 3, however, any and all prerequisites have been done away with, in favor of allowing players to be able to better customize their characters as early as they can.
